Title: Requires insurance companies to disclose claims information to municipalities employing 400 or more employees
Summary: Requires insurance companies to disclose claims information to municipalities employing 400 or more employees to determine how their benefits are used; provides for imposition of a fine for failure to disclose such information in a timely manner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring insurance companies to disclose claims information to municipalities
